publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3767 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Protect our Urban Villages—That the Parliament supports the campaigns established against the opening of a Sainsbury’s in Stockbridge and a Tesco in Broughton; is concerned about the impact that the opening of these stores would have on local retailers in the area; notes that both areas are already well served by larger supermarkets as well as a variety of quality local food retailers, and adds its backing to the local residents and businesses in these areas who are fighting to protect the future of their urban villages.

S3M-3767 Protect our Urban Villages (lodged on 23 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Pringle*, Gil Paterson*, Patrick Harvie*, Angela Constance*, Sandra White*, Robin Harper*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-3767 Protect our Urban Villages (lodged on 23 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Jim Hume*
S3M-3767 Protect our Urban Villages (lodged on 23 March 2009) Margaret Smith*

S3M-3767 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Protect our Urban Villages—That the Parliament supports the campaigns established against the opening of a Sainsbury’s in Stockbridge and a Tesco in Broughton; is concerned about the impact that the opening of these stores would have on local retailers in the area; notes that both areas are already well served by larger supermarkets as well as a variety of quality local food retailers, and adds its backing to the local residents and businesses in these areas who are fighting to protect the future of their urban villages. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Mike Pringle, Gil Paterson, Patrick Harvie, Angela Constance, Sandra White, Robin Harper, Malcolm Chisholm, Bill Kidd, Rob Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Jim Hume, Margaret Smith
S3M-3767 Protect our Urban Villages (lodged on 23 March 2009) Alison McInnes*
